title: Plotting Non-Uniform Images with Matplotlib
description: This lab provides a step-by-step guide on how to use the NonUniformImage class in Python's Matplotlib library. NonUniformImage allows users to plot images with non-uniform pixel positions.

meta.title: NonUniformImage | Python Matplotlib Tutorial
meta.description: Step-by-step guide on using the NonUniformImage class in Python's Matplotlib library to plot images with non-uniform pixel positions.
meta.keywords: NonUniformImage, Python, Matplotlib, Image Plotting, Data Visualization
